bike.description: C-4 UD carbon, Integrated head tube w/1 1/4" lower, Aero seat tube, Internal cable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-4 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay w/ETC and forged Aluminum drop out w/replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 Carbon Monocoque w/RIB Tech, Tapered Carbon steerer & carbon drop out
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake, 20-speed, Flight Deck compatible
Oval W-530 Aero Alloy Clincher Wheelset,  30mm rim - 700c
Vittoria Rubino Pro II, 700 x 23c, Kevlar Bead-Folding
FSA No. 42 1 1/8"U- 1 1/2"L Integrated, w/Alloy convex topcap
Oval SR-700 Sweep w/ Ti Rails
C-4 Aero Carbon w/ Ritchey Clamp System
Oval RB-500 Forged Alloy Dual Pivot w/Cartridge Pads
